skill.name: theme-factory
skill.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
skill.summary: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML la...

security_audit.summary: Official skill from a trusted source with pre-reviewed content. Minimal audit completed based on provided instructions and file scan.

content.user_title: Apply a polished theme to your artifacts
content.value_statement: Your slides and documents can look inconsistent and unprofessional. This skill applies cohesive color palettes and font pairings from curated themes.
actual_capabilities: Display the theme showcase PDF for visual selection
Apply a selected theme with specified colors and fonts
Provide hex color palettes and header body font pairings
Recommend theme usage contexts from the theme notes
Create a custom theme when none of the presets fit
limitations: Requires a user to choose or approve a theme
Does not modify the theme showcase PDF
Does not generate slide or document content
Font availability depends on the user environment

use_cases.title: Refresh a pitch deck
use_cases.description: Select a branded theme and apply consistent colors and fonts across slides.

use_cases.title: Standardize reports
use_cases.description: Apply a professional palette and typography to client reports.

use_cases.title: Create a custom theme
use_cases.description: Generate a new theme when presets do not match the brief.

prompt_templates.title: Pick a theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Show the theme showcase and help me pick one for a nonprofit annual report.

prompt_templates.title: Apply a preset
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the Ocean Depths theme to my slide deck and list the colors and fonts used.

prompt_templates.title: Compare options
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare Modern Minimalist and Tech Innovation for a software launch and recommend one.

prompt_templates.title: Create custom theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a new theme for a luxury spa brand and apply it to the deck.

output_examples.input: Apply the Forest Canopy theme to my slides.
output: Applied Forest Canopy palette with Forest Green, Sage, Olive, and Ivory
Set headers to FreeSerif Bold and body text to FreeSans
Suggested use for sustainability and outdoor branding

best_practices: Ask for the audience and artifact type before recommending a theme
Confirm the selected theme before applying changes
Check contrast and readability after applying colors
anti_patterns: Apply a theme without user confirmation
Mix colors from multiple themes in one artifact
Ignore font availability or substitution needs

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. It provides theme guidance that can be applied in any of these platforms.

faq.question: Are there limits on the number of themes?
faq.answer: There are 10 preset themes, plus an option to create a custom theme.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with slide or doc tools?
faq.answer: Yes. Apply the provided colors and fonts in your chosen tool.

faq.question: Does it handle sensitive data?
faq.answer: No data is stored. It uses only the theme files and your prompts.

faq.question: What if a theme looks wrong in my deck?
faq.answer: Request adjustments or choose a different theme and reapply.

faq.question: How is it different from generic styling advice?
faq.answer: It provides specific, curated palettes and font pairings with usage notes.
